about.title: About
about.subtitle: Let me introduce myself
about.description: Hi!, I'm Victor , a passionate web developer from Lima, Peru. My focus is creating digital solutions, offering products that are functional, scalable, and visually appealing. My main goal is transforming ideas into real projects through the use of modern technologies.

profile.title: Profile
profile.description: I am a web developer with a focus on frontend technologies. I enjoy creating user-friendly interfaces and ensuring a smooth user experience. My expertise includes HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and various frameworks.

skills.title: Skills
skills.description: Skilled in JavaScript, TypeScript, React, Vue.js, Lit, Node.js, Express, MongoDB, Tailwind CSS, and more modern technologies & tools for web development.

resume.title: Resume
resume.subtitle: More About My Credentials
resume.description: Discover my professional experience and academic background, reflecting my commitment and continuous growth in software development.

experience.title: Work Experience
experience.description-1: As a Junior Software Engineer, I have contributed to the development and maintenance of web applications for clients using React, Vue.js, and Angular. I specialize in building dynamic interfaces and reusable components, collaborating with cross-functional teams to integrate frontend solutions with backend systems.
experience.description-2: Reviewed and evaluated AI-generated code, providing actionable feedback to enhance its accuracy and effectiveness. Identified and reported proper and improper tool usage, contributing to the improvement of AI models. Additionally, collaborated with teams to implement recommendations, increasing the quality and relevance of the generated code.
experience.description-3: Designed and implemented custom web solutions tailored to client needs, utilizing modern technologies such as React, Node.js, and MongoDB. Responsibilities included developing user-friendly interfaces, optimizing application performance, and ensuring seamless integration between frontend and backend.

education.title: Education
education.title-1: Professional Certificate in Full Stack Web Development
education.description-1: Completed an intensive program focused on modern full-stack web development. Gained expertise in technologies such as React, Node.js, Express, and MongoDB, developing practical skills to build scalable and responsive web applications. The program emphasized hands-on projects, collaborative coding, and software engineering best practices.
education.description-2: Completed foundational coursework in electronic systems, circuit design, and programming, acquiring a strong technical foundation in problem-solving and analytical thinking. Gained experience applying engineering principles to design and optimize electronic components while developing teamwork and project-based learning skills.
education.description-3: Although my background is in industrial electricity, my studies provided a solid foundation in technical problem-solving, analytical thinking, and project management. These skills have been essential in my transition to software development, where I apply similar logical reasoning and troubleshooting techniques to build and optimize software solutions.

certificates.title: Certificates
certificates.description: I have earned several certifications that validate my skills and knowledge in web development and software engineering, demonstrating my commitment to continuous learning and professional growth.
